name: The Fool
description: The Fool advises that you lighten up and be spontaneous beyond logic.

name: The Magician
description: Have faith in your own creativity and intuition, be open-minded and curious.

name: The High Priestess
description: You must cooperate with your inner spirit more in order to remove distractions.

name: The Empress
description: Trust in the good sense you have shown thus far, be caring and thoughtful.

name: The Emperor
description: Reach within you to find natural leadership and self-control.

name: The Hierophant
description: Return to your studies! Broaden your experiences and educate yourself.

name: The Lovers
description: Careful consideration in the long-term is necessary. Potential compromises.

name: The Chariot
description: Prepare for travel, taste the joy of freedom, and be receptive to people.

name: Strength
description: Assertively discipline yourself, separate your ego, set an example!

name: The Hermit
description: Think carefully in seclusion, tell everyone to leave you alone until you are ready.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: Follow and accept the flow of dramatically changing patterns - you are safe here.

name: Justice
description: Observe other perspectives, subtle inferencing will yield wise assessments.

name: The Hanged Man
description: Surrender illusions of control, sometimes bad things happen to good people.

name: Death
description: Time to move on, detach from the old ways in favour of your ultimate interests.

name: Temperance
description: Identify and seek that which is missing in your life, be organized and disciplined.

name: The Devil
description: Express your emotions and acknowledge your feelings to remain true to yourself.

name: The Tower
description: You are an agent of change, but do not leave yourself vulnerable as you plunge into the future.

name: The Star
description: Connect to your higher self, quietly contemplate and listen for the voice within.

name: The Moon
description: Trust your bodily instincts, meditate, be a witness and do nothing.

name: The Sun
description: Have confidence in your natural divinity, focus on the real positives and be a light for others.

name: Judgement
description: Release your hidden potential, divest from fruitless endeavours and trust your impulses.

name: The World
description: Do whatever you want! You cannot err so keep moving forward! Do not allow your ego to inflate.
